User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://esklenchen.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow sensitive areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /wp-admin/
Disallow: /wp-includes/
Disallow: /wp-content/plugins/
Disallow: /wp-content/themes/
Disallow: /cgi-bin/
Disallow: /tmp/
Disallow: /private/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /servicios
Allow: /inversores
Allow: /analisis
Allow: /reforma-sin-pagar
Allow: /sobre-nosotros
Allow: /contacto

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1
